title: For fun: What if you could have 2 keystones?
body:
Stuff like Glacial + Predator, Fleet + Grasp

What do you think would be meta?

replies.body: I think PTA and Conqueror would be counterintuitive because PTA doesn't increase true damage, and Conqueror reduces your non-true damage to become true damage, thus decreasing the PTA damage amplify. Well, depends on which gets calculated first anyway.

Electro + Dank harvest -> every assassin, ever
Aery + grasp -> one of the more opressive toplaners
FF+PtA -> adc
Predator + Electrocute; -> hecarim
Spellbook + Klepto/Comet -> mid/ezreal
And Conq + Electro Riven.

Would be busted AF. 

Also Conq+lethal tempo Yi would be... disgusting.

Comet+Electrocute would be the thing most midlaners grabbed, with Comet+Aery on many others.  

I could see PtA+Conqueror on ADCs.  

Grasp+Conqueror would work on top laners.

Pta + hail of blades

Fleet + Electrocute
Those 2 combinations would probably cause the most uprage

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qVUHZcHy,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-09-03T22:39:41.933+0000)
>
> Klepto + Aery {{champion:81}} {{champion:37}} 
> 

lol thats pretty disgusting now that I think about it

PtA + hail of blades

predator and phase rush
